com.metreeca.gate.policies

Class ComboPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.gate.policies.ComboPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Policy

    public abstract class ComboPolicy
extends Object
implements Policy
    Combo policy.

    Delegates secret conformance verification to a delegate policy, possibly assembled as a combination of other policies.

      • delegate

        protected Policy delegate()
        Retrieves the delegate policy.
        Returns:
        the policy credential validation is delegated to
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the delegate policy wasn't configured

      • delegate

        protected ComboPolicy delegate(Policy delegate)
        Configures the delegate policy.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the policy credential validation is delegated to
        Returns:
        this combo policy
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if delegate is null

      • verify

        public boolean verify(IRI user,
                      String secret)
        Description copied from interface: Policy
        Verifies a secret.
        Specified by:
        verify in interface Policy
        Parameters:
        user - a handle identifying the user the secret belongs to
        secret - the secret to be verified
        Returns:
        true, if secret conforms to the well-formedness rules defined by this policy; false, otherwise
